meanings.definition: A person who holds irrational beliefs or opinions.
meanings.sent1: Some irrationalists believe in superstitions and magic.
meanings.sent2: The irrationalists refused to listen to any logical arguments.
meanings.sent3: The irrationalists thought wearing a lucky charm would help them win the game.
meanings.sent4: She was surrounded by a group of irrationalists, lost in their own world of unfounded beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The irrationalists' stubbornness in their irrational beliefs was truly astounding.

meanings.definition: Those who reject reason or logic in favor of irrationality.
meanings.sent1: The irrationalists dismissed all scientific evidence presented to them.
meanings.sent2: It was clear that the irrationalists were not open to rational discussions.
meanings.sent3: The irrationalists' decision to follow their gut feeling led to unexpected consequences.
meanings.sent4: In a world of rationality, the irrationalists stood out like a sore thumb.
meanings.sent5: The irrationalists' defiance of logic was both puzzling and concerning.
